about_the_game:
IT IS THE DAWN OF THE 27TH CENTURY.

THE GREED OF MAN HAS MANIFESTED INTO PHYSICAL FORM, TAINTING THE EARTH WITH UNHOLY INFECTION.

SOCIETY HAS COLLAPSED.

HUMANITY IS NEAR EXTINCTION.

THE RULING CLASS REMAINS INTACT.

Tear through a dark, atmospheric environment at lightning speeds and battle terrifying eldritch creatures in this fast-paced, physics-based metroidvania. Discover the mystery behind civilization’s fall, and rise up against the transhumanist dystopia that took its place.

THE ROAD TO HELL IS PAVED IN GOLD.

content_descriptors.notes: Quantum Cortex contains images of blood, gore, and human suffering, which will make many players uncomfortable. Please consider this before making a purchase.
